scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @wingsuits/shared && npm run build --workspace client
scripts.build:server: cd game-server && go build -o bin/server cmd/server/main.go
scripts.stop:all: supabase stop && echo 'Stopped all services. Kill any remaining processes manually if needed.'
scripts.setup: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? console.log('Run scripts/setup-env.sh in Git Bash or WSL') : require('child_process').spawn('bash', ['scripts/setup-env.sh'], {stdio: 'inherit'})"
